mapper.select: select USER_SE_CODE as id, USER_NM as name, PHOTO_STRE_FILE_NM as profileImageId, TEACHER_SE_CODE as userType, SCHUL_CODE as userSpaceInfo, CONCAT(ST_GRADE, '학년 ', ST_CLASS, '반') as userSpaceOrgInfo, USER_ID as uniqId, CONFM_AT as isFirstInvite, SEXDSTN as sex, EMAIL_ADRES as userEmail from COMTNMBER where USER_ID = #{uniqId}
select CASE WHEN count(*) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END as userExists from COMTNMBER where USER_SE_CODE = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into COMTNMBER( USER_ID, USER_SE_CODE, PASSWORD, USER_NM, PHOTO_STRE_FILE_NM, EMAIL_ADRES, SEXDSTN, CONFM_AT, ST_GRADE, ST_CLASS, TEACHER_SE_CODE, SCHUL_CODE, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) values ( #{uniqId}, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{profileImageId}, #{userEmail}, #{sex}, 'N', #{gradeNm}, #{classNm}, #{userType}, #{userSpaceInfo}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNMBER SET USER_NM = #{name}, PASSWORD = #{password}, PHOTO_STRE_FILE_NM = #{profileImageId}, EMAIL_ADRES = #{userEmail}, SEXDSTN = #{sex}, TEACHER_SE_CODE = #{userType}, SCHUL_CODE = #{userSpaceInfo}, ST_GRADE = #{gradeNm}, ST_CLASS = #{classNm}, LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM = now(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{uniqId} WHERE USER_ID = #{uniqId}
mapper.select: with sub as ( SELECT a.POLL_ID, a.POLL_STATUS FROM COMTNBBSPOOLMANAGE a WHERE a.USER_ID = #{uniqId} ) SELECT mstr.POLL_NM as pollNm, mstr.POLL_BGNDE as startDate, mstr.POLL_ENDDE as endDate, case when sub.POLL_STATUS is null then 'todo' else sub.POLL_STATUS end as status, case when cast(mstr.POLL_ENDDE as date) <= cast(now() as date) then false else true end as expired FROM COMTNBBSPOLL mstr left join sub on mstr.POLL_ID = sub.POLL_ID

with mstr as ( select a.POLL_ID, a.POLL_NM, b.USER_ID from COMTNBBSPOLL a, COMTNMBER b group by a.POLL_ID, b.USER_ID ) select group_concat(mstr.POLL_ID order by mstr.POLL_ID separator ",") as pollId, group_concat(mstr.POLL_NM order by mstr.POLL_ID separator ",") as pollNm, mstr.USER_ID as userId, sub.USER_NM as name, sub.EMAIL_ADRES as email, concat(sub.ST_GRADE, '학년 ', sub.ST_CLASS, '반') as classInfo, sub.SEXDSTN as sex, group_concat(case when sub2.POLL_STATUS = 'done' then true else false end order by mstr.POLL_ID separator ",") as isParticipate from mstr left join COMTNMBER sub on mstr.USER_ID = sub.USER_ID left join COMTNBBSPOOLMANAGE sub2 on mstr.USER_ID = sub2.USER_ID and mstr.POLL_ID = sub2.POLL_ID where sub.SCHUL_CODE = '이작초등학교' and sub.ST_GRADE = '1' and sub.ST_CLASS = '3' group by mstr.USER_ID, sub.USER_NM, sub.EMAIL_ADRES, sub.ST_GRADE, sub.ST_CLASS where sub.SCHUL_CODE = #{userSpaceInfo} and sub.ST_GRADE = #{gradeNm} and sub.ST_CLASS = #{classNm}
